ing: 1/2 fluid ounce raspberry-flavored liqueur (such as ChambordÂ®)
1/2 fluid ounce coffee-flavored liqueur (such as KahluaÂ®)
des: "A creamy treat - like grown-up raspberry ice cream!"
ins: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice and top with brandy, raspberry-flavored liqueur, and coffee-flavored liqueur; cover shaker and shake vigorously for 20 seconds. Add cream and gently shake for 5 seconds. Strain drink into a cocktail glass.
